name: Unlock User Code
description: Sent when a user selects Unlock on the Sign In page to provide a code that is used to unlock the account.
subject: Your Account Unlock Code is ${token}
body:
Dear ${user.name},

A request has been made to unlock your ${PRODUCT_NAME} account. If you made this request, please copy the following code into the prompt in ${PRODUCT_NAME} to verify your identity:

${token}

This code expires as soon as it's used, or on ${expires}.

If you did not make this request, please contact your IT administrator immediately.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
